language.entry: Overlord

"Did the treasure room of Nazarick moved here? Are you pretending to be a mortal blacksmith, Pandora Actor? Immediately reveal yourself!"
{colour_start|set_title}- Undead Passive -{colour_end} In town can only gamble or meditate for stress relief.
{colour_start|stun}- Food Unnecessary -{colour_end} No Food Consumption No Heal from Food Immune to Starve Damage Immune to Starve Stress
{colour_start|stun}- Emotional Supression -{colour_end} Immune to Siren's Song If Virtued: Immune to Stress Heal If Afflicted: Maximum Stress Resist (Default -80% Stress)

Momonga is the guild master of Ainz Ooal Gown and the Leader of all Almighty Forty-One Supreme Beings of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. He was titled as the Overlord, who hold the power of the Death itself.
{colour_start|stun}- Aura of Horror -{colour_end} The skeleton appearance and obviously undead characteristic of Ainz Ooal Gown make other heroes highly stressed.
When casting spells except Time Stop and doing non-crits (or if the spell can't crit at all), every other hero suffers permanent dot stress for 1 pt/rd, can stack, can be dispelled, until battle end, or until target hero is afflicted.

Non-Overlord User: +20% Stress (1 Battle)
The Goal of All Life is DEATH!
Any feelings on witnessing such power bringing death even to the unliving?
Game's over. 10th-Level Spell Â· Time Stop!
The wheel of time shall bring the end to all.
Friends, how do you think about my awesome name?
I will stay here untill I got the treasure that belongs to nobody else.
They are so beautiful -- those stars that surrounding me.
I have lots of healing potions...
How about this healing spell scroll?
Drink it, and you will be ok.
You need to focus. Don't make the same mistake again.
I believe you can overcome it, just like me in the past.
It doesn't matter. Everyone will make mistakes.
In the past, there was no one who did not know this name.
Let the name of Ainz Ooal Gown spread all over the world!
..."An overwhelming pressure fills everything around, as if time stops"...
The darkness may be your enemy, but it is an ally to the master of death.
PVP, player vs player, the key to success is a full preparation of information.
Fully prepared, and one breath to win, these are basic PK tactics everyone can easily master.
You mortals cannot use spells above level six? Then I shall give you some easy-to-use scrolls.
...(Summons a pocket from a tiny portal and pick out a scroll)...
Then I will tell you the answer... is "Cash Shop Item".
Just a copy of the relics from the treasure room of Nazarick is enough for this mission.
You are not qualified to use World Items, but maybe I can give you some counterfeits as appropriate.
These weapons, though counterfeits, remind me of my guild members. Use them wisely.
Ambush? So their patience finnaly runs out.
How dare someone ambush Ainz Ooal Gown?
Narberal, don't underestimate those enemies.
Time to prove your value, my partners.
Are these all you can do? You don't even deserve to be a magic caster.
What level of magic is this? You must do better!
Let me teach you how necromancy spells could kill enemies instantly!
Enchantment spell? Using on an undead? Are you serious?
How could it be ...
Damn... Where is my Freedom of Movement scroll?
My bones are broken... Never mind, I feal no pain.
Bow down before the true master of death!
Bow down before the true master of death!
Bow down before the true master of death!
Bow down before the true master of death!
Bow down before the true master of death!
Should this be considered a divination spell?
My end is not today as your poor divination spell prophesied.
The true death comes from sky should only be my legendary spell "Fallen Down".
Where does that stone come from? Summoned from the elemental plane of earth?
The power from firearm and that from magic, guess which one is more powerful?
The fuse is fired, we need a mass teleportation spell, now!
Time to use some defensive spells.
The little swine commands the giant one? Interesting, worth a research.
Maybe these swines do have enough intelligence to serve the Great Tomb.
That giant one angered, just remind me of my barbarian partner in the past.
Anyone need some soup made from bones?
Although I don't feel hot, my items will be damaged in this boiling water.
Anyone could cast a Cone of Cold?
Well, saved a teleportation spell for me.
Meaningless, just one more teleportation spell wasted.
Try to disturb my spell? Fool.
Meaningless, my spell can launch from anywhere.
Very similar to my delay teleportation spell. Interesting.
What's this? Even let an undead feel sick.
Stop this rude behavior!
There aren't many things that could let me feel pain.
How could these eggs grow on bones?
My mana was drained. So this is the battle style of that worm?
Much like those from the Nine Hells, very suitable for a poor worm.
If you think I'm weak to holy spells...Well, that's not entirely false.
Maybe I really should bring some relics to improve my holy resistance.
Holy and fire... They are always the weapons of you kind, even make me feel boring.
Your holy spell is no match from Shalltear!
Greetings, I'm Momonga, a warrior in travel. This is my partner Narberal, a magic caster.
I see... I will visit your town for further plans.
How could a skeleton drink? Will it leak out from my neck?
I think I don't have the organ to do that, besides my Emotional Supression.
It is a shame for arcane casters to ask the gods for help.
How could a skeleton bleed? Besides I can't feel pain at all.
How could a skeleton drink? Will it leak out from my neck?
I think I don't have the organ to do that, besides my Emotional Supression.
It is a shame for arcane casters to ask the gods for help.
How could a skeleton bleed? Besides I can't feel pain at all.
Are you sure you are capable to be a healer?
I don't need your treatment. What I need is just a dispel magic spell.
*Message* Sebas, bring some divine casters from the Great Tomb, I've had enough for these mortals.
Neither magic nor science, it's a miracle that these things could work.
This town will be the first place to spread the name of Ainz Ooal Gown.
Hope my friends heard the name of our guild and come to me if they are here too.
Narberal, don't stare at that human. He is harmless.
That graveyard seems a bit strange, maybe I should go for a check.
Sebas, protect that girl well. I had a promise with her dead sister.
Hamusuke, take me to the wild, I need a break.
The Nazarick coins can't be used here? Sigh...
*Message* Demiurge, time to push on our plans.
What could an undead enjoy in a human's town?
I doubt there could be any entertainment that fits an undead.
There's one and only one Overlord! Pandora Actor, stop this ridiculous prank.
There's one and only one Overlord! Pandora Actor, stop this ridiculous prank.
The Ancient One doesn't seem to welcome me any more.
These cursed lands are even worse than Lower planes.
Perhaps I should cast a legendary spell on that darkest dungeon...
So it is the truth of this world, another tease for mortals.
If you have lost all your courage, come to my Nazarick for refuge.
*Message* Albedo, gather all the guardians. We must get ready for war.
What?...
*Snort*
Well done.
Well, saved a teleportation spell for me.
Meaningless, just one more teleportation spell wasted.
Time is our ally, but it isn't if we were lazy.
I must spread the name of my guild as far as possible.
Keep moving. Your mission hasn't been finished yet.
So many traces of ancient magics. Record them, Narberal.
Maybe I should check my scrolls one more time just in case.
Don't lower your guards. I sense some strange things in these halls.
A true adventure reminds me of many things. But it's not the time to recall the past.
Need some rest? Let me check my spells.
Undead doesn't need to rest. But you mortals do need.
Maybe we should set a campfire?
Halt! This divination spell should do the scouting.
Maybe we should cast a mass teleportation spell and jump into the deepest room directly?
You mortals seriously don't want to finish this mission?
Are we retreating?
Anything that hasn't prepared well?
Narberal, watch our back.
This adventure is doomed as always. Sigh.
...(Unspeakable silence)...
I have foreseen that.
Well...Well...An attack towards mind?
*Snort*
Interesting.
I feel stressed even as an undead.
Thanks to the Emotional Supression, I feel nothing.
I have a bad feeling.
I really hate battles that are not well prepared.
I've had enough of this.
If only my former guild partners were here.
Then so be it.
I feel pain. This is quite rare.
You will pay for that in the name of Ainz Ooal Gown!
I need a healer! Where are the divine casters?
You have proved yourself capable enough to be raised as a death knight AFTER you are dead!
Well done, few could break through my defense.
Impossible! My defensive spell fails!
How dare you! I will send you to Kyouhukou's cockroach room!
Steady, my partner!
Hold on. Healing spells will be ready soon.
Do not fall! I've already lost enough friends.
Steel yourself! I shall handle them.
Use my scroll of Body of Effulgent Beryl now.
You have done well. Leave the rest to me.
...(Should I tell them about the resurrection wand?)...
Is this what it feels like to be challenged by the death?
How can I die if death is already my underling?
The Guild... Ainz Ooal Gown must live on!
Don't give in to death before the true master of it.
Use my scroll of Indomitability now.
I command you not to die in the name of Nazarick!
...(Hold the resurrection wand tightly and indecisively)...
Death is your enemy, not mine.
Nazarick is immortal, so is Ainz Ooal Gown.
The experiment of resurrection ritual can wait.
I'm fully recovered. It's time to pay you back for this!
Warriors of Nazarick never fall easily.
Hold fast, you are not permitted to die today.
Easy, easy, every adventurer has to go through that.
...(Feel relieved)...
Impossible! Poison should heal me instead!
Impossible! How can I bleed?
Spell permanency: Darkvision!
My necromancy spells should be more powerful in the darkness.
Light is the ally of adventurers, especially newcomers. Should I remind you of that again?
Monsters will be more ferocious in the darkness. Are you well prepared?
Extend Spell: Mass Darkvision!
Marching in the darkness suits the warriors of Nazarick well.
No torches? Never mind. I will cast a Daylight spell if needed.
Use this blackness wisely, if you want to become experienced adventurers.
Wait, I need to cast a Detect Magic.
Sigh. If only my Nazarick coins could work.
Record them carefully, Narberal. We need to fully understand this world.
Where's my dimensional pockets...
Ancient magics. But not as powerful as mine.
Damn! What's that? A 0th-level cantrip?
An unsuccessful experiment. Record that too, Narberal.
Maybe next time I should summon a skeleton to do that.
My Protection from Evil spell didn't work. Interesting.
Hope I don't need to visit a divine caster after this raid.
Detect Trap! Well... Nothing.
Keep moving. We got no time to waste on these.
Let's continue our adventure.
I feel a bit bored. Let's go.
Identify! Hmmm... Never mind.
Ancient One, the true immortality you dreamed of is just right in front of you.
We are wasting time with these worms.
It's a disrespect to keep Ainz Ooal Gown waiting.
Need more time? How about a Time Stop spell?
A team made of mortals could only carry themselves just so far...
You kind have disgraced the name of Nazarick...
Today is indeed a good day to adventure.
Well down, but don't lower your guards. Enemies of Nazarick are everywhere.
Maybe I should prepare my resurrection spell...
Healing spells are not my specialty.
Seems I don't need to use the resurrection wand.
Having a healer in the team is necessary.
Maybe I need a healing potion too?
Hope there are enough "Indomitability" scrolls left...
No mortals can break through Ainz Ooal Gown's defense.
Seems I don't need to prepare the "Body of Effulgent Beryl" spell.
Everything is going well, I feel pleased even as an undead.
Everything is going according to Ainz Ooal Gown's plan.
"Touch Me"... "Perorochino"... "Tabula Smaragdina"... "Bukubukuchagama"...
Even with the Emotional Supression, I've had enough of this!
A well prepared magic caster fears nothing.
Adventure and campfire... Just like the past...
This raid is really suitable for newcomers.
That chair made of bones is really uncomfortable...
Maybe I have chose the wrong difficulty for this raid?
I can do nothing with the lack of your experience levels.
No more firewood? Fire magic is enough.
No more firewood? Summon some plants then.
Not enough food? Nevermind. Undead has no need to eat.
Isn't Creat Food a spell that every caster must learn?
Where's my dimensional pockets...
What should undead eat? Souls?
... It seems this body has no appetite now.
Don't worry... Humans are more than just food.
...(Fall into silence while looking at food in the hand)...
Eating around a campfire is also an essential part of adventure.
A well preparation is always commendable at any time.
Yearning for fire and warmth has always been the innate nature for mortals.
The "Black Sword" adventurer team... Maybe this team could have a different ending.
You have the willpower just like that Silver Paladin. Hold to it.
All this reminds me of the time when I first met "Touch Me"...
Narberal, guard this camp while we're resting.
Such an interesting space-time structure...
This is... Illusion spell? No... Enchantment spell?
Magics across planes are not very common...
Is this place on the etheric plane? The astral plane? Or the shadow plane?
It seems time and space have been stabilized finally.
Teleportation spell? No, it's just an illusion.
Whether real or not, these pathetic creations remain unchanged.
Space transfer? No, we're still on the main material plane.
Seems that comet cannot read my memory.
That comet really lacks some tastes for beauty.
Interesting... Very interesting...
Mortals are always misled by externals.
Magics playing with time and space are dangerous...
Spell that can affect the mind of an undead is rather rare.
Dreamlands? Kadath?
Neither dead nor alive... How pathetic!
In the name of Ainz Ooal Gown, I will give you the true death you have been longing for!
Ancient magic... How could a mortal ever cast such a spell?
The Star and the Darkest, which one is more powerful?
This is not the town that you mortals come from.
Repaying good with good and evil with evil. This is the norm of the world.
I am Ainz Ooal Gown. With that name at stake, there can be no defeat.
Everything goes well according to my plans.
Haven't you finished yet? It's my turn now.
It's my turn now. Feel despair!
As an act of mercy, I will make sure your death is painless.
Should remember to cast a Detect Trap spell next time.
A trap? It makes no sense to an undead.
For adventurers, trap is the most common enemy.
This is more embarrassing than riding a huge hamster...
All my friends are gone.
Death is coming to its very own Master.
Forgot to tell you, I'm very hypocritical.
Someone is spying on us.
So this is what it feels like to take damage.
Is this pain?
I'm taking damage, right?
You dare to chase little girls, but donât have the courage to stand against enemies?
You'll die painfully and in despair for your foolishness!
You will pay for this!
Those who perished in otherâs battles are worms!
This is for the Guild.
I simply did not want to dirty myself with your mud.
I'm speechless. I would never fit into my children.
This is stupid. My tactics are nothing.
There was no need for me to fight someone of your level seriously.
You weren't even an enemy worth using magic on.
Bow down before me!
Ainz Ooal Gown does not know defeat.
No matter what skills you have, know my magic is superior!
With the combined might of all Forty-One Supreme Beings from the beginning, you have no chance of victory.
Victory belongs to the Great Tomb of Nazarick!
Offer your life to me without hesitance.
So... my Emotional Supression starts to take effect.
This is the grace of Ainz Ooal Gown.
There are no enemies that can't be defeated in the glory of Nazarick!
Spell Sequence - Dragonic Power - Greater Full Potential - Paranormal Intuition.
Spell Sequence - See Through - Sensor Boost - Greater Luck.
Will of Nazarick the Great Tomb!
Triplet Maximize Magic - Heavenly Aura!
My Life Essence starts to take effect.
Do not underestimate the natural healing power of this body.
What could I do if my necromancy spells are useless against these monsters?
Ancient monsters summoned by ancient magics, this madness will never end!
I havn't brought enough World Items for this raid, why are we still here!?
You intended!?
You haven't protect me well!
"YGGDRASIL" (the Tree of World) is online again?
My mind is painful... but it's not that bad really.
My soul is suffering, but I Enjoy it, since it remind me of humanity!
Could you use something more violent? Axe or great sword!?
How cowardly you are... Useless fools!
You such pathetic villains!!
This kind of wound... Even my soul would bleed...
That's for me!? Perfect... I will take the rest!
I should get more... And more!
How dare you to continue this journey while I'm going back home!?
Everyone hates me, why?
Leave me here. It's good for everyone...
Ahï¼My skin burnsï¼Get me out of here!
Am I Ainz Ooal Gown or Suzuki Satoru? Does that matters?
Better I just go back to the Great Tomb?
Retreat needed, situation bad, enemies unstopable.
Fall back, my mana is low!
I need time to regain mana.
The Ancient One is coming, we have to go.
My magic might be interrupted if I stay in the front line.
They might have World Items too, we must retreat!
I need more pain to remind me of humanity.
I need more fighting to test my spells!
Don't hurt my children, fight with me!
I will draw their attention. You shall...
I will draw their attention. Now run...
I will borrow some time for you to recover. Hurry...
I need time to re-cast my protecting magic!
Hold on. It will take time for the golden hourglass to trigger.
I should keep distant, otherwise my spell might harm myself.
I will borrow some time for you. Be quick...
I must bring an end to it, even if it will be the end of myself.
My end draws near, so does Nazarick.
You won't need me anymore, just like the past.
Better step back than just stand here all day.
There's no good for us to hide.
Perfect necromancy materials. They're mine!
Time to harvest souls!
I won't let any others loot these relics!
No, Aniz Ooal Gown can't just stay here, I can't.
I refuse to stay here. How could a magic caster serve as the meat shield?
I'm not a tank class. Time to fall back.
Suzuki Satoru is just a useless mortal, how could he lead the Great Tomb?
Who... Who is calling me? "Touch Me", is that you?
I'm the true master. You are nothing more than a slave.
Suzuki Satoru...is dying.
I need to rest, I need time to prepare my magic.
Thought I would trust you? Fool.
I follow only myself, I AM Aniz Ooal Gown!
Get away! I will do what I want.
Killing should be done like this.
Oh, it's time. Where are you, demiurge?
None can interfer Ainz Ooal Gown!
Bah!
Let me teach you how to exterminate mortals.
I will destroy them in my way!
Their souls are mine!
I pay lots of price for my power, so I will use it at my will.
I'm in charge now, *game player*!
I'm just an outsider, a skeleton.
Neither a hero, nor a monster, I'm nothing.
Lack of experience will lead to wrong decisions...
So many eyes! So many faces!!
Nothing but a "two-feet sheep"...
Hum-hum... Haw-haw-haw... Hah-hah-hah-hah!!
I see... I'm Ainz Ooal Gown now. Ainz Ooal Gown must act like this.
Damn the Emotional Supression!
The death knell sounds.
*Whispering to himself*
So many conspiracies surrounding me...
Traitors... Even Shalltear didn't do that when she is charmed.
I have nothing left, no guild partners, no trustworthy friends! And you dare goading me?
Pain is the way, death is the key.
We will be dead today, what a delicious irony for a master of death magic.
Dare standing before Aniz Ooal Gown, then you are dead.
Silence! I can't catch my thoughts.
... What? you wanna me to talk with you?!
I shall be the only survivor.
Time for dinner, "friends".
Boring. Camping is nothing for an undead.
My children are calling me, should we answer them?
Darkest time, isn't it? Could be even darker, may I show it?
...(Unspeakable silence)...
Mortals, think you are smart?!
That monster should not be taken to the Great Tomb!
No, not my children, me! It should be me!! Your only opponent is mine!!
Keep on!! My protection magic is far from broken!
I would rot in my grave... The same you are!
Join me! Join my kingdom, you forsakens!
You, my partner, my children, are all devils.
I had told you I could block that, behold!
Why quit our guild, Peroroncino?
I won't let your betrayal hurt me again as Shalltear did!
Don't disobey the master of death!
Show me your worth. Try dodging this!
The sacrifices for Shub-Niggurath... what had the ritual inflenced me?
You traitor! But you are far less than Shalltear, what a shame.
Only pain could remind me of my human life.
Who would need a skeleton?
We had better end ourselves before it's too late.
The Great Tomb might need me no more.
If I'm dead, they would gone... Right!?
Damn it! I'm not a human already.
I can't retreat. It's a shame for Ainz Ooal Gown.
There are ambushs behind, we can't retreat, that will only attract more enemies.
This shall be the end of my legend.
Write my story down after I'm dead.
It's a legendary battle, why escaping?
The loot is mine, I won't let any others get those World Items!
I must end this fight, I'm not a coward. For The Great Tomb!
Take them down quickly, otherwise they might find the way to Nazarick.
I had never felt that kind of terror before!
Cold and dark! Just like the undead himself.
I feel pain, I feel I'm human again.
It is not enough to awaken my feeling!
Easy to foreseen that, even without divination spells.
I'm not surprised about that, since our best equipments are not used wisely.
What a remarkable battle! Maybe it's as strong as the world boss?
A respectable enemy! Maybe it has reached 100 level?
Kill that one before it's too late!
How could that normal weapons damage me?
So many pains to suffer.
I'm not a coward. Why would these happen?
Dodged, how skillful I am.
You heard that?! Ambush!
Unwise.
Not enough stamina!
Today is my worst day.
What a damned day, it could be worse.
Aye yes... Just prove you are more powerful than me, then.
STOP! That one belongs to my magic!
Sigh. Is it my turn yet?
Only Ainz Ooal Gown can decide who attacks whom!
You think yourself powerful. But you are an insect.
Motals fighting mortals. What dull amusement.
Maybe my staff could do more damage when hitting someone's head.
*Message* Why can't I call the GM?
You can't even handle this? ...Emmm...
All my friends had left me just because of you kind.
My patience is running out. Any more like that, I will cast Fallen Down to erase everyone including you!
I will end you, trash!
Next time I should go alone.
Well done, I will tear your soul apart for that!
Of course. We are just mortals.
How useless, maybe I should summon my warriors from the Great Tomb to replace you.
We got all the information needed, time to retreat?
Surely, I shouldn't have overrated your skill.
Is this a battle between world bosses?
Those players want to invade the Great Tomb!
Target me, not my children...
How my envy stirs! I even cannot feel pain!
Useless ones like you kind are the worst.
If you want to kill yourself, I could offer a better way.
Hmmmm... Meaningless attacks.
Have you tried to change your armor for a better one?
They would chase us!
We got some small mistakes on our plan.
Death is coming for you.
Obviously a traitor, you're one of them!
Albedo, where are you?
Good, you are as skillful as a huge hamster.
It's useless... No matter you hide anywhere.
Please, I need to research that carefully.
You try to escape?
You'd better stop that thought.
Face the death!
*Creepy Smile*
*Threatening Gaze*
Stay, and I will show you my true power!
You can't escape from battle no matter where you go. There is no need to fall back.
It really hurts me that you run away from battle.
Couldn't you cast any spell?
I know you are searching for my weakness, you traitor!
No need to waste that.
No, I'm already healed.
It won't stop anything.
Don't pay your attention on those little tricks.
Nothing can prevent you from death.
Move that holy relic away!
You want me to accept your little trick?
I don't trust you, and your skills.
Let me enjoy this long-lost pain...
I don't need your help.
Ha. I have changed my mind.
You can't heal the one who is already dead.
Calm down, I have died many times...
I don't want to stay under your "holy light". It's uncomfortable
I only accept healing from my spells!
Use your skill on others who really needed. I'm an undead with no flesh.
There's no flesh on my bones, your spell is meaningless.
I won't let you touch me!
I know your purpose is not helping me.
Put you hand where I can see them, you little worm!
Only death remains in this body.
This is the end I am waiting for.
Leave me alone...
I'm enjoying it seriously.
My power only comes from my knowledge.
I will use my own magicï¼yours will only disturb my spells.
...(Awkward Silence)...
My my...What do you want to do exactly? Show off your spells in front of a MASTER?
We should not rest here...
This place is cursed...
There are enemies nearby.
Giants might attack us!
I know what they are doing.
They will kill us while we sleep.
We need to solve the problem quickly...
Boring, let's continue our journey.
Hope we could end the fights quickly.
Are you the first time to a "raid"?
Too weak, even not enough to be materials for necromancy spells.
My former partners...
I should have a rest, since I'm the only one fighting.
I'm tired. Tired to take care of you rookies.
Give me some time to regain mana.
We all gonna die in this journey.
All shall be the same...
Our end shall come soon.
It's enough for me.
What a weird journey.
Let's just rest.
A bad idea.
I feel fear and tired for no reason.
Stop your foolish behaviors.
Enemies will kill us.
We need to slain more ememies.
Where are you when we are fighting?
You're not skillful enough.
You don't deserve it.
It's useless, I only rely on myself.
Let me rest.
It won't change anything.
You are doomed.
Only I can lead you to victory.
It dosen't belong to me.
There's no time to eat.
Tastes strange...
All that needed is more fighting!
I'm full, no thanks.
I don't need that.
Could have more salt.
What could I eat now? Souls?
I miss those nutrition cream on earth.
Maybe later.
Ugh, I can't eat food of you mortals!
Unexpected Horror
...It resembled nothing so much as an incarnation of death, born from the darkness of another world. It was as though time itself had stood still in the wake of a Supreme Beingâs advent.
Minor Healing Potion
Mirror of Remote Viewing
Ultimate Shooting Star Super
Amaterasu & Tsukuyomi
Female Sensei's Iron Fist of Wraith
Houyi's Bow
Blood Sucking Meat Devourer
Takemikazuchi MK 8
Avarice & Generosity
Depiction of Nature & Society
